name: Antstable
description:
This is Antstable ! 

We have created this game in a weekend for ludum dare 49, We use Construct3 to develop it. The theme was unstable.

At first we didn't have any idea what games we wanted to make, then, an idea bringing another, we decided to go for a safe utilisation of the theme. Nevertheless, we decided to take an original road from classic city builder.

The physics implementation was easy with construct3, but find the right value was the challenge. Also, there is a lot of different things for beginners as we are, families in Construct3 prove themselves very useful !

Also we had a technical problem for the game art. Unexpected delay comes, but in a final rush we make it 1h before the end.

Hope you will enjoy Antstable !

See you soon.
